title: jAlam EnappA sankaTa
sahitya:
jAlam EnappA sankaTa haraNA mAyA


anupallavi

  shIlar tunbattait-tIrkka vEgamAik-kOlam koNDu varum kAlam illaiyO


caraNam    patturuk-koNDu nI shatrukkaLaip-paDuttadum verum kaviyO
pAncAli mAnam kAttadellAm pazhaiya kaTTuk-kathaiyO
tUya manadOr bhaktiyin palan tIyar kaiyil udaiyO
dIna rakSakan alaiyO nin tiruvaruLukkum vilaiyO nin
sarattirkken iDar malaiyO unadu cakkaram shuzhalavillaiyO innum
